comments.body: Can you create a rb entry for this please?
Addressed review comments and rebased for 0.5 SNAPSHOT.
Updated for latest tez API changes.
Address review comments.
I put some comments for HIVE-7482.1.patch on the RB (just after you posted patch 2).
I haven't addressed your comments yet. I will address them shortly and put up a .3.
+1 for doc issues fixed in patch 3
The consolidated patch of HIVE-7481 and this jira.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12670453
Test failures are unrelated.
.12 is rebased.
Rebased patch. Fix intermittent failure.
Committed to trunk. Thanks [~vikram.dixit]!

I noticed this change got rid of the string-interning in thrift data-types for metastore.  As there were memory improvements because of interning, I was wondering if there was a plan to have those back?  I understand the way its done by modifying the generated files, and will get overriden at every thrift source-generation.  Thanks

[~szehon] I realized that too but thrift kept generating the sources that way. I am not sure what I was doing wrong. I had some other folks try it too and got mixed results. Any idea of how we can get consistent results? I used thrift 0.9.

Ah I see it now.  It was added in HIVE-7975, supposedly there is a google-replacer plugin during thriftif that does the replacements.  If that plugin works, maybe there was a collision and these changes were done without that plugin?   If so, we can just do a regeneration, hopefully.
Filed HIVE-8314 to fix the broken string intern calls
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
